text:
4
* When study is refined, some slight adjustment
in categories will result. Status of about twenty
stations is undetermined.
Recommendation: That planning be developed to serve key and
secondary stations initially. Optional stations and tape
delay stations will be served by tape. Their addition to the
network will occur as the expansion of the financial base
and technical facilities will allow.
Attachments: List of Key Stations
List of Secondary Stations
